synopsis.text: Thatâ€™s Kyouta, an aspiring rock musician, who, along with his bandmates and childhood friend Yokko, is on the brink of stardom. But their world takes a supernatural turn when Kyouta discovers he's a "mindbreaker," capable of not only seeing mystical beings but also controlling them with his music. Unbeknownst to most, these spectral entities have been waging an invisible war for centuries, with the fate of Earth hanging in the balance. As Kyouta and Yokko get entangled in this conflict, they find themselves at the heart of a battle that could shape the course of the Aquarian Age. With love, loyalty, and the destiny of the world at stake, Kyouta must harness his newfound abilities to navigate this unseen realm and protect those he cares about.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
